title: Support custom loss function for DNNRegressor
body_html:
DNNRegressor is commonly used, and it does not support customize the loss function, which limits itself.

I wanna know if there are any schedule to support the customize loss function for DNNRegressor or is there any difficulties for supporting that?
body_text:
